type.description:
## Freeze --- [Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/freeze) Freezes the entity that has the power, as if they're in a Powder Snow block. Type ID: `origins:freeze` --- ### Examples ```json { "type": "origins:freeze" } ``` This example will freeze the entity that has the power.
```json { "type": "origins:freeze", "condition": { "type": "origins:biome", "condition": { "type": "origins:precipitation", "precipitation": "snow" } } } ``` This example will freeze the entity that has the power if the entity is in a biome that snows.
type.markdownDescription:
## Freeze --- [Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/freeze) Freezes the entity that has the power, as if they're in a Powder Snow block. Type ID: `origins:freeze` --- ### Examples ```json { "type": "origins:freeze" } ``` This example will freeze the entity that has the power.
```json { "type": "origins:freeze", "condition": { "type": "origins:biome", "condition": { "type": "origins:precipitation", "precipitation": "snow" } } } ``` This example will freeze the entity that has the power if the entity is in a biome that snows.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Freeze (Power Type) date: 2021-10-02

Freeze

Power Type

Freezes the entity that has the power, as if they're in a Powder Snow block.

Type ID: origins:freeze

Fields

None.

Examples

{
    "type": "origins:freeze"
}

This example will freeze the entity that has the power. 

{
    "type": "origins:freeze",
    "condition": {
        "type": "origins:biome",
        "condition": {
            "type": "origins:precipitation",
            "precipitation": "snow"
        }
    }
}

This example will freeze the entity that has the power if the entity is in a biome that snows.
